*Mantella followed Megatron with a frown on her face. She hated when bots
were treated badly. She wanted to help Shredder if a fight begins, after
all, she was thinking of leaving anyway and she kinda liked Shredder*




*But Stingtra stayed with Quickstrike* Stingtra: Don't you want talk or
something? *Stingtra says to Quickstrike*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2000 8:00 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder looks from Megatron to Waspinator, realizing that he had no hope
of
> bargaining with the two bots. He growls.
>
> "Follow me," he says to Waspinator and turns to walk out of the base,
picking
> a random direction in the forest but glancing down at his scanner first to
> make it seem like he was following a signal.
>
> There was no way he was going to give anyone anything without reward, not
> even Megatron. A plan begins to form in his mind. He would take Waspinator
a
> distance out to the forest and shoot him in the back. Then he would go
join a
> different group, or something to that extent.
>
> He pauses at the exit of the base, waiting for Waspinator to follow him.
>
